messages.content: Hi Gus, apologies for this once again. Completely understand and no worries. We will feed this back to the team. Thank you :)

Hi, The food got binned as it was inedible, as for the post I don't think pizza punks would be happy with the post I would put up for what was sent to me as I actually like their restaurant and I hope this was one slip-up as they have told me.
Hi Gus, wanted to check in on when you're planning to post the stories and post up please?

Hi Gus, apologies for the delay - the delivery team was really swamped last night and paid for deliveries had to be priorities unfortunately. Hope you still enjoyed it and also the Bake at Home too, which should be a good fun to make.

Hi Gus, so sorry for the inconvenience. I will look into this for you in the morning with the team. And the other pizza - Bake at Home - is a bonus pizza from the team for you to try also. So sorry again!

I just got 2 cold pizzas delivered there from pizza punks nearly 4 hours late? Should have been delivered around about 5. They were Looking like they had been sitting there for 4 hours but there was another box with 2 pizzas to make myself. The delivery driver said they had been really swamped but surely you wouldn't dish that out to a paying customer?
No worries. Will request Pepperoni and Margherita for delivery today at 5pm
Yeah could you swap the salami one thanks
Hi Gus, we are only offering 2x pizzas for this opportunity. Would you like to swap either the Salami or Pepperoni for the Margherita?
Ok could you add a margarita pizza instead? 5pm today if possible?

Sorry, I've just seen the menu. There's no cheese tub available. Do you mean dipping sauce? They have: Garlic Mayo, Hot Sauce, BBQ, Vegan Mayo. We can't actually include items that are not on the menu I'm afraid.
Perfect. I'll ask the team if they can add a tub of cheese sauce on the side. Will request this now - when would you like it to be delivered please?

Pepperoni and salami pizza with loads of toppings ð
Can you add a tub of cheese sauce on the side
My address is 32 Menteith avenue Bishopbriggs. Glasgow g641hp
Mobile is 07809888073. Withheld numbers are ignored.

Thanks alot I love pizza punks ðð»
Hey sounds great I'll have a look I'm 4.8 miles away lol G64

Hiya,

Iâm getting in touch from @pizzapunksofficial. Delivering restaurant quality pizza straight to your door, their pizzas feature the signature San Franciscan sourdough which are made fresh in their kitchen, proofed for 48 hours and hand-stretched to order.

We would like to deliver a couple of hot pizzas for you to try (if you live locally to G2 5UB - within 5 miles radius), in exchange for some social media content. Tagging @pizzapunksofficial on both posts and stories.

Do let me know what you think - and if this sounds good, please send over your preference of two pizza out of the Classics and Specials menu here: https://menus.preoday.com/Pizza-Punks#/main/venue/menu

Delivery is available this week - let me know if you have a preferred day and delivery time between 4pm-9pm. And please send over your address details (+ mobile number for use on delivery day just in case).

Thank you x
